mapper.insert: insert into users (id, name, password, phone1, phone2, phone3, email, postcode, address, detailaddress, agreemailcheck, agreesmscheck) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{email}, #{postCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{agreeEmailCheck}, #{agreeSmsCheck})
mapper.select: select password from users where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: update users set id = #{id}, name = #{name}, password = #{password}, phone1 = #{phone1}, phone2 = #{phone2}, phone3 = #{phone3}, email = #{email}, postcode = #{postCode}, address = #{address}, detailaddress = #{detailAddress}, agreemailCheck = #{agreeEmailCheck}, agreesmscheck = #{agreeSmsCheck} where id = #{id}
